TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlNodeEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 可能发生事件，仅当调用方法。The event can occur only when you call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用事件打印在调用时遇到未知 XML 节点的各种属性类的方法。The following example uses the event of the to print various properties of an unknown XML node that is encountered when calling the class's method. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取未知 XML 节点的行号。

span.span: Gets the line number of the unknown XML node.

value.span: 未知 XML 节点的行号。

MemberSignature.Value: public string LocalName { get; }
.property instance string LocalName
Public ReadOnly Property LocalName As String
public: property System::String ^ LocalName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取正在被反序列化的 XML 节点的 XML 本地名称。

span.span: Gets the XML local name of the XML node being deserialized.

value.span: 正在被反序列化的节点的 XML 本地名称。

span.span: The XML local name of the node being deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的 XML 限定名称的本地名称 （也称为是本地的一部分）。The property returns the local name (also known as a local part) of an XML qualified name. 属性符合 1999年http://www.w3.org规范`Namespaces in XML`。The property conforms to the 1999 http://www.w3.org specification `Namespaces in XML`. ## Examples 下面的示例将打印在调用时遇到未知 XML 节点的类的方法。The following example prints the of an unknown XML node that is encountered when calling the class's method. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将打印导致未知节点的名称事件发生。The following example prints the name of the unknown node that caused the event to occur. MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.XmlNodeType NodeType { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.Xml.XmlNodeType NodeType
Public ReadOnly Property NodeType As XmlNodeType
public: property System::Xml::XmlNodeType NodeType { System::Xml::XmlNodeType get(); };

summary.span: 获取正在被反序列化的 XML 节点的类型。

span.span: Gets the type of the XML node being deserialized.

value.span: 表示正在被反序列化的 XML 节点的 。

span.span: The that represents the XML node being deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举返回反序列化节点的说明。The enumeration returns a description of the node being deserialized. 例如，如果节点是一个注释返回"注释"。For example, it returns "Comment" if the node is a comment. ## Examples 下面的示例将打印导致未知节点的说明事件发生。The following example prints a description of the unknown node that caused the event to occur. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
